title: Isolated builds broken on default branch

content.raw:
Isolated builds were broken by pull request #447 (atlas shim interface).

The following is a set of commands to build 356f47267b4d, which is the default branch before the pull request was merged:
~~~
# working instance of default branch
cd src/drcsim
hg up 356f47267b4d
cd ../..
catkin_make_isolated --install
. install_isolated/setup.bash
. install_isolated/share/drcsim/setup.sh
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch
# atlas launches with arms out
~~~

Repeat with 4a1962c32920, and you will see a linking error:
~~~
Linking CXX shared library drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins/lib/libAtlasPlugin.so
...
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lAtlasSimInterface
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
...
<== Failed to process package 'drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins':
~~~
